website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quality control concerns, this LEGO Speed Champions Corvette building set is a fun and minimally challenging option that's perfect for young fans of the popular race car.
pros: Gives youngsters the opportunity to build the iconic Chevrolet Corvette with lots of accessories to create precise detailing
Not too difficult to put together, so it's a good choice for younger kids
cons: A few complaints of the box arriving with damage, and of the wrong set being shipped
Somewhat pricey, considering the set is limited to just one car and minifigure

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for me and a Vette-head adult friend. We both enjoyed the quick assembly and attention to detail for a small “model”.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Grow

customer_reviews.title: Damaged when arrived
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t opened the box yet because it is a christmas gift for someone but the box arrived extremely damaged and smushed so I’m hoping that the legos inside are not damaged. The box itself is a lot smaller than I was expecting as well.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Logan

customer_reviews.title: Our neighbor kiddo got this for his birthday. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Our neighbor kiddo got this for his birthday. He loves corvette's. He has played with it every day I have seen him outside. He came over to tell me how much he likes it. He is 5.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: My son got two different cars and was over the moon! These are cool gifts to keep a kid unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to complete my collection.
customer_reviews.text: This iem will be part of my Lego Speed Champions collection.
customer_reviews.author: L.P. Demers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun to put together. Not as big as we would have liked but still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Bluestreak

customer_reviews.title: He loved both of them
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandson for his birthday along with the Mustang GT. He loved both of them, promptly put them together, and has them on display on his bookshelf with other Lego projects.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bliven

customer_reviews.title: Nephew found it fun to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Nephew found it fun to assemble. It represents his LAST toy, as a child, given on his 16th year of Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: george full

customer_reviews.title: Solid speed champion kit, average
customer_reviews.text: Average speed champions build. Stickers help a lot. Solid build with a red interior.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Buford

customer_reviews.title: LEGO’s best speed champion set
customer_reviews.text: One of the best designed sets by LEGO in this line.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son actually selected these items and enjoyed putting them together. He plays with them often.

customer_reviews.title: He thinks these cars are very detailed and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son collects Lego ! He thinks these cars are very detailed and awesome !

customer_reviews.title: Box was all smashed
customer_reviews.text: The box was all smashed. It was a gift for someone and it looks terrible.

customer_reviews.title: Photo not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The box looked like it had been sat upon. This was a gift for a family member.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Lego Speed Champions Chevrolet Corvette (confirmed by order details/summary) but received the Ford Mustang. Frustrating!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome good looking kit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick, but box was a little damaged. However, all pieces were there.

customer_reviews.title: The box was crushed! I’m not thrilled, it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was crushed! I’m not thrilled, it’s a present and I have no choice but to give them this mangled mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you are never too old for legos
customer_reviews.text: Cute little car and super easy to put together. Kept my husband busy for at least 20 min, he turned into a kid again when building this. Will look nice on his desk
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Loved putting it together was a lot of fun and ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved putting it together was a lot of fun and it's sits up on the shelf with my other special leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Olbrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Corvette
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lego corvette. Looks great. Has two sets of rims (technically like hub caps)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: A bit past the Lego phase, so really enjoyed putting this together. Enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems fine! I purchased it for a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Roppolo

customer_reviews.title: Corvette Lover
customer_reviews.text: Do you want all the perks of a brand new Corvette without paying the price? Well here is a great way to show people your serious. This kit is all you need to start your mid-life crisis. Why spend the money on a real car when you can just buy this and look at it. The build quality is amazing and the instructions are clear. Seriously though, this is a great present and was fun to build. Great toy. Love corvettes.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Lindt

customer_reviews.title: really cool, the package came in with the box crushed ...
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is typical Lego, really cool, the package came in with the box crushed in on one side. Everything inside seems ok though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Reda

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, however I bought these as a gift for one my sons friends and the boxes are completely massed
customer_reviews.author: Christipher

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Chevy, ended up being a Ford
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a mint condition display piece for my friends birthday, that package was heavily damaged and the instructions were misprinted. I guess he will just have to settle on building it to display.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in an envelope - crushed box
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped in an envelope. The box was crushed. Items seem to be okay inside, just looks bad for a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

product_meta.title: LEGO Speed Champions Chevrolet Corvette Z06 (75870)
product_meta.description: Hit top speed with this buildable, minifigure-scale LEGO Speed Champions version of a true American icon: the Chevrolet Corvette Z06. The set includes interchangeable wheel trims, racing helmet, wrench and a television camera element, to fire the imagination of budding motor racing fans. Includes a Chevrolet Racing driver minifigure.
feature_bullets: Includes a Chevrolet Racing driver minifigure.

The race-ready, buildable Chevrolet Corvette Z06 can fit a minifigure inside and has a removable windshield, 2 sets of interchangeable wheel trims, plus authentic Chevrolet Corvette logo and headlight stickers.
Accessory elements include the Chevrolet racing driver's helmet, a wrench and a TV camera.
Match up against the 75871 Ford Mustang GT for a desert-racing due.
Measures over 1 inches (4cm) high, 5 inches (14cm) long and 1 inch (5cm) wide.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars165 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
